data.title: Jesse Belle Deutschendorf’s biography: who is John Denver’s daughter?
data.meta_description: Jesse Belle Deutschendorf is the late John Denver's daughter. Read on to learn more about her childhood, family background, career, marriage, and much more.
data.text:
Jesse Belle Deutschendorf is the late John Denver's daughter. Her father was a famous musician, activist, actor, record producer, songwriter, and humanitarian. Jesse prefers to live a quiet life away from media attention; little is known about her.

John Denver, the legendary musician, had three children, and one of them is Jesse Belle Deutschendorf. Here is all you need to know about her.

Profile summary

Full nameJesse Belle DeutschendorfGenderFemaleDate of birth18 May 1989Age34 years old (as of 2023)Zodiac signTaurusPlace of birthAspen, Colorado, United StatesCurrent residenceAspen, Colorado, United StatesNationalityAmericanEthnicityWhiteReligionChristianitySexualityStraightHeight5'6" (167 cm)Weight132 lbs (60 kgs)Hair colourBrownEye colourBlueFatherHenry John DeutschendorfMotherCassandra DelaneySiblings2Relationship statusMarriedSpouseEli LeGateChildren3ProfessionArtist and jeweller

Jesse Belle Deutschendorf's bio

John Denver's daughter was born in 1989 in Aspen, Colorado, United States. Jesse Belle Deutschendorf's parents are Cassandra Delaney and Henry John Deutschendorf.

Her father was a public figure known for his acoustic style of music. He released several albums, including The Flower That Shattered the Stone, Dreamland Express, Back Home Again, and Whose Garden Was This.

Her mother is an Australian actress known for starring in Fair Game, One Night Stand, Hurricane Smith, Not Quite Hollywood: Deleted And Extended Scenes and Barracuda.

When is Jesse Belle Deutschendorf's birthday?

Jesse celebrates her birthday on the 18th of May. As of 2023, Jesse Belle Deutschendorf's age is 32 years old. Her Zodiac sign is Taurus.

John Denver's family

She has Australian roots from her maternal side, and her father was of German descent. The names of her paternal grandparents are Lt. Col. Henry John Deutschendorf and Erma Louise Swope. Ron Deutschendorf is her paternal uncle, while Delvene Delaney is her maternal aunt.

Her father and mother had a short-lived marriage. The two had a two-year courtship before marrying in 1988. The couple settled in Aspen, where their only daughter was born. They separated in 1991 when their child was only two years old and divorced in 1993.

When did John Denver die?

On the 12th of October 1997, the 53-year-old musician had an airplane crash in Monterey Bay near Pacific Grove, California. He was flying the aircraft with the registration number N555JD.

Musician John Denver passed away when his daughter was only eight years old. His funeral was held on the 17th of October at the Faith Presbyterian Church in Aurora, Colorado, and officiated by Pastor Les Felker.

Where is Cassandra Delaney now?

Since her divorce from the late singer in 1993, she has maintained a low-profile lifestyle and has not appeared in any films since 1992.

Who are John Denver's kids?

John Denver had three children. Jesse is the only known biological child of the late musician and Cassandra. She has two step-siblings through adoption from her father's previous relationship with Annie Martell.

Jesse Belle Deutschendorf's siblings are Zachary John and Anna Kate. She was raised by her mother, Cassandra, after the death of her father. Today, Jesse is a professional artist and jeweller who seldom appears in the media.

Her step-siblings are also not in the public eye. In 2014, she and her step-brother made a rare appearance. They attended a ceremony to unveil a star on the Hollywood Walk Of Fame in honour of their late father.

The two helped Hollywood Chamber of Commerce President Leron Gubler unveil the 2,531st Walk of Fame Star at 7065 Hollywood Boulevard. They accepted the honour on behalf of their family.

What does Jesse Belle Deutschendorf do for a living?

Jesse is an artist and jeweller; she shares her painting work on her Instagram page. Contrary to the expectations of many, she is not in the entertainment scene.

Is Jesse Belle Deutschendorf married?

John Denver's daughter is married to Eli LeGate. There is minimal information about where the couple met and how long they dated before getting married on the 27th of September 2019.

Eli LeGate and Jesse Belle Deutschendorf's wedding was held at the John Denver Sanctuary. The sanctuary sits on a 4.5-acre piece of land. The landscaped retreat features perennial flowers, lush grass, and engraved rocks in honour of the late musician.

Close family and friends attended the wedding ceremony. The couple has kept off media attention, and not much is known about their private life.

Jesse Belle Deutschendorf's net worth

According to Featured Biography, the celebrity's daughter has an alleged net worth of $300k. Her father was very wealthy. Most of his riches came from his music career. At the time of his death, John Denver had released 33 albums and had an estimated net worth of $60 million.

Fast facts

Here are interesting facts about John Denver's daughter, Jesse Belle Deutschendorf.

Her surname, Deutschendorf, is a family name with deep Prussian roots.

She was an illustrator for the book Pedro's Magic Christmas.

She attended the Institute of Integrative Nutrition.

She has a strong passion for diet and health.

Jesse Belle Deutschendorf is the late John Denver's daughter. Her father died when she was very young, and she has grown into an art-loving woman. She prefers a private life, unlike her father, who was a public figure.

Legit.ng recently published Jesse Wellen's biography. Jesse is an American YouTube star who gained popularity after posting clever pranks on his peers and friends. Besides being a YouTuber, he is also an actor and producer.

Jesse previously worked for the United States Air Force. He started his YouTube channel on the 10th of November 2009. By August 2012, the channel had over one million subscribers.

Source: Legit.ng
